profileSummary.title: Professional Summary
profileSummary.content: Dynamic and innovative software engineer with over 8+ years of experience designing and delivering high-performance, scalable applications. Adept at building robust microservices architectures, leveraging cutting-edge cloud platforms like AWS, and utilizing containerization tools such as Docker and Kubernetes to streamline development and deployment. A proven leader in crafting efficient, reliable, and maintainable software solutions, with a passion for driving innovation, optimizing performance, and enhancing user experiences. Known for bridging the gap between technical excellence and business goals while fostering collaboration across cross-functional teams.

skills.title: Programming Languages
skills.text: Java (up to Java 17), Python, GOSU, Scala, Javascript, Typescript

skills.title: Messaging Systems
skills.text: Apache Kafka for real-time event streaming

experiences.title: Consultant
bullets: Architected, designed, and developed highly scalable and performance-driven applications utilizing Java and Spring Boot, ensuring modularity and efficient code management.
Implemented microservices architecture to improve application scalability, maintainability, and fault isolation, enabling seamless deployment and efficient resource utilization.
Integrated Apache Kafka for real-time data streaming and processing, ensuring low-latency communication and high-throughput message handling across distributed systems.
Leveraged AWS cloud services, including EC2, S3, RDS, and Lambda, to build fault-tolerant, highly available, and cost-optimized solutions tailored to business needs.
Containerized applications using Docker to standardize environments and deployed them on Kubernetes clusters for automated orchestration, scalability, and resilience.
Automated build, test, and deployment pipelines using Jenkins CI/CD, significantly reducing deployment times and enhancing development productivity.
Monitored system performance and reliability using Datadog, proactively identifying and resolving bottlenecks to ensure optimal performance and minimal downtime.
Conducted rigorous testing, including load testing, stress testing, and performance benchmarking, to validate application robustness and ensure resilience under high-traffic conditions.

experiences.title: Consultant
bullets: Developed, customized, and enhanced Guidewire applications (PolicyCenter, BillingCenter, and ClaimCenter) using GOSU programming language to meet diverse business requirements and improve operational efficiency across insurance workflows.

Collaborated extensively with stakeholders, business analysts, and project managers to gather, analyze, and translate business requirements into actionable technical solutions, ensuring alignment with organizational objectives.
Optimized user interfaces, workflows, and business rules to improve user experience and streamline key insurance processes, delivering a more intuitive and efficient system for end-users.

Implemented robust testing methodologies, including unit, integration, and system testing, to validate application functionality and maintain software quality, reliability, and compliance with industry standards.
Documented technical designs and enhancements to support ongoing maintenance, knowledge sharing, and scalability of the Guidewire platform.

experiences.title: Associate-Projects
bullets: Designed, developed, and maintained robust backend services leveraging Java and Spring Boot, ensuring scalability, maintainability, and performance for mission-critical applications.
Integrated Hibernate ORM framework to facilitate seamless and efficient database interactions, optimizing query performance and enabling smooth data handling across relational databases.

Engineered RESTful APIs to support seamless communication and integration between internal systems and external platforms, adhering to industry best practices for API design, security, and documentation.

Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, architects, and QA engineers, to gather requirements, define technical specifications, and deliver high-quality software solutions within tight deadlines.

Diagnosed and resolved complex technical issues, including performance bottlenecks and system failures, to enhance the overall stability, reliability, and responsiveness of applications, minimizing downtime and ensuring business continuity.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Architected, developed, and debugged complex stock broker applications to streamline stock transactions, portfolio management, and investment tracking, utilizing a wide array of technologies to ensure high performance, scalability, and security.

Designed and implemented dynamic, user-friendly web interfaces by converting wireframes into fully functional web pages using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, ensuring seamless user experiences and responsiveness across devices.

Mentored and coached junior developers, providing technical guidance, best practice recommendations, and comprehensive code reviews to maintain code quality, improve team productivity, and foster a culture of continuous learning.
Led Proof of Concept (POC) initiatives to assess and integrate emerging technologies into existing platforms, enhancing system capabilities and aligning with evolving business needs.

education.title: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science
